body_content.explanation: something that makes you understand there is a possible danger or problem, especially one in the future:
examples: Completely without warning, he turned up at my door with all four children!
There's a warning on the cigarette packet that says "Cigarettes cause cancer".
I'm not surprised you feel sick after eating so much - let it be a warning to you!
Just a word of warning - restaurants in this area can be very expensive.
The Health Minister issued a warning about the dangers of sunbathing.
They can't dismiss you just like that - they have to give you a written warning first.
The police fired warning shots but the rioting continued.

body_content.explanation: a physical condition that shows someone has a disease:
examples: The warning signs of the illness are respiratory problems and dizziness.
